RAG Retrieval System and LLM Connected by LangChain

Quick Start
Project Brief

Customizable AI for Synthetic Biology

Leverage fine-tuned LLMs specialized in synthetic biology to provide precise and relevant insights.

Efficient Local Knowledge Retrieval

The system integrates a local RAG setup with high-quality synthetic biology literature vectors for rapid access to relevant data.

Seamless Integration with LangChain

Harness the power of LangChain to effortlessly connect your LLM and RAG for streamlined AI-driven knowledge retrieval.
